title: 为什么玩家死后物品掉出来了但重生后背包里还有？
author: Gerryawa

replies.author: 鬼畜畜
replies.txt_content:
jjjooo233 发表于 2019-8-10 13:56
1.14.4版本，我觉得应该和1.14没什么差别
更新Essentials至最新版本，修复因Spigot更新导致的掉落物表问题

https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/9089

If you've updated Spigot within the past couple of days, you should update EssentialsX and any other plugins that simulate the keepInventory gamerule as soon as possible to fix a dupe exploit introduced by changes in Spigot.

Additional info: this affects not only Spigot but also the most recent 1.14.4 versions of Spigot's "CraftBukkit" plus any other derivatives. The change responsible for the exploit was introduced to CraftBukkit and Spigot on 26th July. If you are running any CB/Spigot/other forks version newer than then, you need to update EssentialsX.

replies.author: Xiaoxinzhi
replies.txt_content: 个人认为是Residence插件问题，我的服务器也有这个问题，只能把领地内权限中死亡保存物品关闭。

replies.author: Gerryawa
replies.txt_content:
Xiaoxinzhi 发表于 2019-8-10 13:46
个人认为是Residence插件问题，我的服务器也有这个问题，只能把领地内权限中死亡保存物品关闭。 ...
怎么关啊，我是萌新
而且我之前开1.12.2服也装了领地插件就没有这个问题
换个版本的领地插件行吗（我1.12.2服用的，文件还在我电脑上）

replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Xiaoxinzhi 于 2019-8-10 14:32 编辑 
Ghost_chu 发表于 2019-8-10 13:58
更新Essentials至最新版本，修复因Spigot更新导致的掉落物表问题

https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/9 ...
1.14.4服务器用最新版paper端，游戏规则死亡掉落，领地内设置不掉落，然后在领地里死，东西掉，背包里还有，还有一个BUG是开启了耐久不消耗以后，三叉戟扔出去，背包里三叉戟还在，捡回来就有两把了。
EssentialsX用的开发版最新2.17.1.11
Residence是4.8.6.6版本
